description:
BA connected allows users to link their digital signage authoring to a robust networking management solution


Improvements
- BCN-17523: Added a FLASH tab in the DWS for systems capable of using onboard / built-in storage instead of having to rely on external storage.
- BCN-17601: Fixed the broken link for the tooltip on the Setup screen and moved the tooltip icon to a more sensible location.
- BCN-17665: Improved terminology consistency in the Network tab (Player ID → Serial No., Setup Type → Publishing Mode, Partner application → Partner App, Firmware → OS); changed references for support@brightsign.biz to support.brightsign.biz.
- BCN-17654: Removed warning dialogs for non-Chrome browsers when using the web interface. The web interface now supports Edge, Safari, Firefox, Opera, and most Chromium-based browsers.
- BCN-17847: Updated the BA:connected application icon.
Bug Fixes
- BCN-15905: Fixed a broken link on the HTML5 Widget Enable Javascript Console tooltip.
- BCN-17351: Fixed an issue in which descenders (the part of the lowercase letter that extends below the baseline of the font) in the Content Library were cropped.
- BCN-17684: Removed Size "Width" and "Height" from the Super State Properties.
- BCN-17705: Fixed an issue where the Presentation Properties would display the key (software variable) instead of the label (UI text).
- BCN-17716: Fixed an issue where adding video or audio media to a canvas would result in failure.
- BCN-17725: Fixed an issue where the desktop app would hang during the upgrade from v1.49.1 to v1.55.1.
- BCN-17730: Fixed an issue where dragging and dropping media from the Mac or Windows desktop into a zone would result in a fatal error.
- BCN-17731: Fixed an issue where adding a player already in a network would result in that player being duplicated in the provisioning list.
- BCN-17798: Fixed an issue where descenders (the part of the lowercase letter that extends below the baseline of the font) on the Admin > Provision > Error dialog were cropped.
